DATA.TEXT: A royal letter...? On Pudding Day?
Did this come from your pa, kid?
Um, I don't know... it was just in the station! Am I in trouble? O-Or, um... is dad in trouble?
No, it's just... for an enemy general to announce a visit on Pudding Day...
Heh, slipped that one out. You're a smart kid, kid.
Yeah, I did say that, but... if your dad sent us a letter today, it can only mean... he's announcing peace.
Which I find weird, if I'm being completely honest.
Did your dad tell you this? His troops just demolished us in the last battle. I was expecting an advance, but...
Heh, maybe your pa is a good person after all, eh, kid?
I'll personally greet him when he touches down here. Thank you for this, mailman... a soldier can finally rest easy today.
With this, the soldier returns to his hideout, and you two go back to your rocket-box.
